videos.description: Gonzaga's Zach Collins gets a block and Silas Melson finishes the play with a 3-Pointer on the other end.
videos.headline: Gonzaga gets a block then gets a lucky bounce on a transition three

videos.description: Gonzaga's Zach Collins blocks a shot and Nigel Williams-Goss hits a jumper in transition.
videos.headline: Gonzaga block leads to two points

videos.description: Postgame Breakdown of Gonzaga's 88-57 win over Santa Clara.
videos.headline: Breaking down Gonzaga's play in the paint and balanced offense against Santa Clara
